meanings.sent1: The unmade bed looked messy and disorganized.
meanings.sent2: The artist stared at the unmade canvas, unsure of where to begin.
meanings.sent3: The unmade puzzle left the child feeling frustrated and defeated.
meanings.sent4: Her unmade promises weighed heavily on her conscience.
meanings.sent5: The unmade clay sculpture sat untouched on the shelf, waiting to be molded.

meanings.sent1: The unmade plans left us with nothing to do on the weekend.
meanings.sent2: The unmade decision caused confusion and uncertainty among the team.
meanings.sent3: His unmade apology only made the situation worse.
meanings.sent4: The unmade knot in the rope caused it to unravel unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The unmade cake batter had to be thrown out due to a missing ingredient.

meanings.sent1: The unmade jigsaw puzzle sat untouched on the table.
meanings.sent2: The unmade Lego set frustrated the child as pieces were scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The unmade furniture in the box awaited assembly instructions.
meanings.sent4: The unmade model airplane lay in pieces on the floor.
meanings.sent5: The unmade sandwich ingredients were spread out on the kitchen counter.
